00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup I2C_Exported_Types I2C exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_TWO_DEV_ADDR)
00054 typedef u8 I2C_AddressTypeDef;
00055 #else
00056 typedef u16 I2C_AddressTypeDef;
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 typedef struct
00060 {
00061   u8  I2C_GeneralCall;
00062   u8  I2C_AddressingMode;
00063   u8  I2C_Acknowledge;
00064   u8  I2C_SpeedOffset;  /* Offset value to reach real speed, recommended I2C_SpeedOffset = I2C PCLK/8000000 */
00065                         /* which based on 4.7K Pull up                                                      */
00066   u32 I2C_Speed;
00067   u16 I2C_OwnAddress;
00068 } I2C_InitTypeDef;
00069 
00070 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_TWO_DEV_ADDR)
00071 typedef enum
00072 {
00073   I2C_DEV_ADDR_0 = 0,
00074   I2C_DEV_ADDR_1
00075 } I2C_ADDR_Enum;
00076 
00077 #define IS_I2C_ADDR(x)  ((x == I2C_DEV_ADDR_0) || (x == I2C_DEV_ADDR_1))
00078 #endif
00079 /**
00080   * @}
00081   */
00082

00086   */
00087 #define I2C_GENERALCALL_ENABLE                      ((u32)0x00000004)
00088 #define I2C_GENERALCALL_DISABLE                     ((u32)0x00000000)
00089 
00090 #define IS_I2C_GENERAL_CALL(CALL)                   ((CALL == I2C_GENERALCALL_ENABLE) || \
00091                                                      (CALL == I2C_GENERALCALL_DISABLE))
00092 
00093 #define I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT                         ((u32)0x00000000)
00094 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_NO_10BIT_MODE)
00095 #define IS_I2C_ACKNOWLEDGE_ADDRESS(ADDRESS)         ((ADDRESS == I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT))
00096 #else
00097 #define I2C_ADDRESSING_10BIT                        ((u32)0x00000080)
00098 
00099 #define IS_I2C_ACKNOWLEDGE_ADDRESS(ADDRESS)         ((ADDRESS == I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT) || \
00100                                                      (ADDRESS == I2C_ADDRESSING_10BIT))
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 #define I2C_ACK_ENABLE                              ((u32)0x00000001)
00104 #define I2C_ACK_DISABLE                             ((u32)0x00000000)
00105 
00106 #define IS_I2C_ACKNOWLEDGE(ACKNOWLEDGE)             ((ACKNOWLEDGE == I2C_ACK_ENABLE) || \
00107                                                      (ACKNOWLEDGE == I2C_ACK_DISABLE))
00108

00114                                                      (ADDR == I2C_ADDR0_DISABLE))

00123 #define I2C_INT_STA                                 ((u32)0x00000001)
00124 #define I2C_INT_STO                                 ((u32)0x00000002)
00125 #define I2C_INT_ADRS                                ((u32)0x00000004)
00126 #define I2C_INT_GCS                                 ((u32)0x00000008)
00127 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_NO_ARBLOS == 0)
00128 #define I2C_INT_ARBLOS                              ((u32)0x00000100)
00129 #endif
00130 #define I2C_INT_RXNACK                              ((u32)0x00000200)
00131 #define I2C_INT_BUSERR                              ((u32)0x00000400)
00132 #define I2C_INT_TOUT                                ((u32)0x00000800)
00133 #define I2C_INT_RXDNE                               ((u32)0x00010000)
00134 #define I2C_INT_TXDE                                ((u32)0x00020000)
00135 #define I2C_INT_RXBF                                ((u32)0x00040000)
00136 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_NO_ARBLOS)
00137 #define I2C_INT_ALL                                 ((u32)0x00070E0F)
00138 #else
00139 #define I2C_INT_ALL                                 ((u32)0x00070F0F)
00140 #endif
00141 
00142 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_NO_ARBLOS)
00143 #define IS_I2C_INT(int)                             (((int & 0xFFF8F1F0) == 0x0) && (int != 0x0))
00144 #else
00145 #define IS_I2C_INT(int)                             (((int & 0xFFF8F0F0) == 0x0) && (int != 0x0))
00146 #endif
00147 
00148 #define I2C_MASTER_READ                             ((u32)0x00000400)
00149 #define I2C_MASTER_WRITE                            ((u32)0x00000000)
00150 
00151 #define IS_I2C_DIRECTION(DIRECTION)                 ((DIRECTION == I2C_MASTER_READ) || \
00152                                                      (DIRECTION == I2C_MASTER_WRITE))
00153 
00154 
00155 #define I2C_REGISTER_CR                             ((u8)0x00)
00156 #define I2C_REGISTER_IER                            ((u8)0x04)
00157 #define I2C_REGISTER_ADDR                           ((u8)0x08)
00158 #define I2C_REGISTER_SR                             ((u8)0x0C)
00159 #define I2C_REGISTER_SHPGR                          ((u8)0x10)
00160 #define I2C_REGISTER_SLPGR                          ((u8)0x14)
00161 #define I2C_REGISTER_DR                             ((u8)0x18)
00162 #define I2C_REGISTER_BFCLR                          ((u8)0x1C)
00163 #define I2C_REGISTER_TAR                            ((u8)0x20)
00164 
00165 #define IS_I2C_REGISTER(REGISTER)                   ((REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_CR) || \
00166                                                      (REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_IER) || \
00167                                                      (REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_ADDR) || \
00168                                                      (REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_SR) || \
00169                                                      (REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_SHPGR) || \
00170                                                      (REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_SLPGR) || \
00171                                                      (REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_DR) || \
00172                                                      (REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_BFCLR) || \
00173                                                      (REGISTER == I2C_REGISTER_TAR))
00174 
00175 
00176 #define I2C_FLAG_STA                                ((u32)0x00000001)
00177 #define I2C_FLAG_STO                                ((u32)0x00000002)
00178 #define I2C_FLAG_ADRS                               ((u32)0x00000004)
00179 #define I2C_FLAG_GCS                                ((u32)0x00000008)
00180 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_NO_ARBLOS)
00181 #define IS_FLAG_ARBLOS(x)                           (0)
00182 #else
00183 #define I2C_FLAG_ARBLOS                             ((u32)0x00000100)
00184 #define IS_FLAG_ARBLOS(x)                           (x == I2C_FLAG_ARBLOS)
00185 #endif
00186 #define I2C_FLAG_RXNACK                             ((u32)0x00000200)
00187 #define I2C_FLAG_BUSERR                             ((u32)0x00000400)
00188 #define I2C_FLAG_TOUTF                              ((u32)0x00000800)
00189 #define I2C_FLAG_RXDNE                              ((u32)0x00010000)
00190 #define I2C_FLAG_TXDE                               ((u32)0x00020000)
00191 #define I2C_FLAG_RXBF                               ((u32)0x00040000)
00192 #define I2C_FLAG_BUSBUSY                            ((u32)0x00080000)
00193 #define I2C_FLAG_MASTER                             ((u32)0x00100000)
00194 #define I2C_FLAG_TXNRX                              ((u32)0x00200000)
00195 
00196 #define IS_I2C_FLAG(FLAG)                           ((FLAG == I2C_FLAG_STA)    || \
00197                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_STO)    || \
00198                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_ADRS)   || \
00199                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_GCS)    || \
00200                                                      IS_FLAG_ARBLOS(FLAG)      || \
00201                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_RXNACK) || \
00202                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_BUSERR) || \
00203                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_TOUTF)  || \
00204                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_RXDNE)  || \
00205                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_TXDE)   || \
00206                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_RXBF)   || \
00207                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_BUSBUSY)|| \
00208                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_MASTER) || \
00209                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_TXNRX))
00210 
00211 #define IS_I2C_CLEAR_FLAG(FLAG)                     (IS_FLAG_ARBLOS(FLAG)      || \
00212                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_RXNACK) || \
00213                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_BUSERR) || \
00214                                                      (FLAG == I2C_FLAG_TOUTF))
00215 
00216 #define I2C_MASTER_SEND_START                       ((u32)0x00180001)
00217 #define I2C_MASTER_RECEIVER_MODE                    ((u32)0x00180004)
00218 #define I2C_MASTER_TRANSMITTER_MODE                 ((u32)0x003A0004)
00219 #define I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY                     ((u32)0x00190000)
00220 #define I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY_NOBUSY              ((u32)0x00010000)
00221 #define I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY                         ((u32)0x003A0000)
00222 #define I2C_MASTER_RX_BUFFER_FULL                   ((u32)0x001D0000)
00223 #define I2C_SLAVE_ACK_TRANSMITTER_ADDRESS           ((u32)0x002A0004)
00224 #define I2C_SLAVE_ACK_RECEIVER_ADDRESS              ((u32)0x00080004)
00225 #define I2C_SLAVE_ACK_GCALL_ADDRESS                 ((u32)0x00080008)
00226 #define I2C_SLAVE_RX_NOT_EMPTY                      ((u32)0x00090000)
00227 #define I2C_SLAVE_RX_NOT_EMPTY_STOP                 ((u32)0x00010002)
00228 #define I2C_SLAVE_TX_EMPTY                          ((u32)0x002A0000)
00229 #define I2C_SLAVE_RX_BUFFER_FULL                    ((u32)0x000D0000)
00230 #define I2C_SLAVE_RECEIVED_NACK                     ((u32)0x00080200)
00231 #define I2C_SLAVE_RECEIVED_NACK_STOP                ((u32)0x00000202)
00232 #define I2C_SLAVE_STOP_DETECTED                     ((u32)0x00000002)
00233 
00234 
00235 #define IS_I2C_STATUS(STATUS)                       ((STATUS == I2C_MASTER_SEND_START)             || \
00236                                                      (STATUS == I2C_MASTER_RECEIVER_MODE)          || \
00237                                                      (STATUS == I2C_MASTER_TRANSMITTER_MODE)       || \
00238                                                      (STATUS == I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY)           || \
00239                                                      (STATUS == I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY_NOBUSY)    || \
00240                                                      (STATUS == I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY)               || \
00241                                                      (STATUS == I2C_MASTER_RX_BUFFER_FULL)         || \
00242                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_ACK_TRANSMITTER_ADDRESS) || \
00243                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_ACK_RECEIVER_ADDRESS)    || \
00244                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_ACK_GCALL_ADDRESS)       || \
00245                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_RX_NOT_EMPTY)            || \
00246                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_RX_NOT_EMPTY_STOP)       || \
00247                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_TX_EMPTY)                || \
00248                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_RX_BUFFER_FULL)          || \
00249                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_RECEIVED_NACK)           || \
00250                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_RECEIVED_NACK_STOP)      || \
00251                                                      (STATUS == I2C_SLAVE_STOP_DETECTED))
00252

00312 #define IS_I2C(x)                                   (IS_I2C0(x) || IS_I2C1(x) || IS_I2C2(x))
00313 #define IS_I2C0(x)                                  (x == HT_I2C0)
00314

00317 #else
00318 #define IS_I2C1(x)                                  (0)
00319 #endif
00320 
00321 #if (LIBCFG_I2C2)
00322 #define IS_I2C2(x)                                  (x == HT_I2C2)
00323 #else
00324 #define IS_I2C2(x)                                  (0)
00325 #endif
00326 
00327 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_NO_10BIT_MODE)
00328 #define IS_I2C_ADDRESS(ADDRESS)                     (ADDRESS <= 0x7F)
00329 #else
00330 #define IS_I2C_ADDRESS(ADDRESS)                     (ADDRESS <= 0x3FF)
00331 #endif
00332 
00333 #define IS_I2C_SPEED(SPEED)                         ((SPEED >= 1) && (SPEED <= 1000000))
00334 
00335 #define IS_I2C_SCL_HIGH(HIGH)                       (HIGH <= 0xFFFF)
00336 
00337 #define IS_I2C_SCL_LOW(LOW)                         (LOW <= 0xFFFF)
00338 
00339 #if (LIBCFG_I2C_TOUT_COUNT_8BIT)
00340 #define IS_I2C_TIMEOUT(TIMEOUT)                     (TIMEOUT <= 0xFF)
00341 #else
00342 #define IS_I2C_TIMEOUT(TIMEOUT)                     (TIMEOUT <= 0xFFFF)
00343 #endif

00345 #define SEQ_FILTER_DISABLE                          ((u32)0x00000000)
00346 #define SEQ_FILTER_1_PCLK                           ((u32)0x00004000)
00347 #define SEQ_FILTER_2_PCLK                           ((u32)0x00008000)
00348 
00349 #define IS_I2C_SEQ_FILTER_MASK(CONFIG)              ((CONFIG == SEQ_FILTER_DISABLE) || \
00350                                                      (CONFIG == SEQ_FILTER_1_PCLK) || \
00351                                                      (CONFIG == SEQ_FILTER_2_PCLK))
